original_text: I was afraid of you, because you are a hard man. You take out what you did not put in and reap what you did not sow.’
korean_text: 이는 당신이 엄한 사람인 것을 내가 무서워함이라 당신은 두지 않은 것을 취하고 심지 않은 것을 거두나이다

sentences.original_text: because you are a hard man
You take out what you did not put in
and reap what you did not sow
